The below lists of segments are whitelists for accounts. You need to *explicitely specify one or more segments* for which accounts and events shall be sent to Outreach.io.
If you do not specify any segment, no account or event will be sent to Outreach.io.

private_settings.name: synchronized_user_segments_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
The above lists of segments are whitelists for users. You need to *explicitely specify one or more segments* for which users and events shall be sent to Outreach.io.
If you do not specify any segment, no users or event will be sent to Outreach.io.
